item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Caring for yourself while caring for others (178 points | 24 comments)
3. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (238 points | 107 comments)
4. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (194 points | 61 comments)

6. 131M American Buildings (20 points | 5 comments)
7. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (166 points | 41 comments)

9. New images of Jupiter (382 points | 61 comments)
10. Useful built-in macOS command-line utilities (643 points | 181 comments)

13. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (44 points | 18 comments)

22. Trump wins presidency for second time (1495 points | 6882 comments)

24. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (233 points | 330 comments)
25. Physicists Spot Quantum Tornadoes Twirling in a 'Supersolid' (13 points | discuss)
26. 3D Rotation Design (86 points | 21 comments)

29. German Coalition Government Collapses (17 points | 5 comments)
